symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: Localized to affected bone, can be severe enough to wake patient at night

symptoms.name: Soft tissue swelling
symptoms.pattern: Localized to area surrounding affected bone

symptoms.name: Headache
symptoms.pattern: Can be sharp, dull, or throbbing; may be localized or lateralized

symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.pattern: Present in a minority of patients

symptoms.name: Weight loss
symptoms.pattern: Present in a minority of patients

symptoms.name: Night sweats
symptoms.pattern: Present in a minority of patients

vital_signs.blood_pressure: Can be elevated (as seen in one case)

physical_findings: Increased skin temperature over mass (in some cases)
No induration, erythema, or discharge (in some cases)

lab_values.creatinine: Can be elevated with amphotericin B treatment

risk_factors: Immunocompromised state (particularly defects in cell-mediated immunity)

imaging_findings.CT_scan: Destructive changes in bone, soft tissue swelling
imaging_findings.MRI: Lesions of the pubis and surrounding soft tissue, bone destruction

required: Culture isolation of Cryptococcus neoformans from bone tissue
supportive: Imaging findings (lytic lesions, increased uptake on bone scan)
